attributes.action: get my 2 girls  back from social services
attributes.additional_details: I have had 3 kids taken of me my son leon who has been adopted who was born in 2009 he was taken of me because I put him in my bed and took him from the foster placement when I was there then I had a little girl in 2012 which I was in a relation ship wiv her dad before then and her was violent so they took my little girl 5 day after she was born when I was still in hosptial with her and they used the same reasons as my son I did not have a chance then the 3rd child I had this year they took an hour after she was born for the same reasons now they are saying neglect which I have never neglected none of my kids I love my kids I am brillent with kids and I would do anything to get them back so I need help to get the girls back please
